Cats are considered unlucky in many cultures because of their association with witchcraft and the supernatural. In some cultures, black cats are thought to bring bad luck, while in others they are thought to be a sign of good luck.

Cats have historically been associated with bad luck because of superstitions that cats are associated with witches and evil spirits. In some cultures, black cats are considered to be the most unlucky, as they are seen as a sign of bad luck and misfortune.
